Articles.Content:
Actually I've enjoyed this for over one year !

But because I'm from Mainland China so here is still a new place for me...

And I'll post my own work here soon:)

Welcome!

Was that title a reference to Mrs. Doubtfire? Cause that's how I took it. XD

Helloooooo MMG, and welcome to the forums.

Now I thought you were trying to sound like Scott Manley when he opens his videos.

We have a very international community here. After all, there's space above every country. 

Happy landings!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-04T14:25:37Z" title="08/04/2015 02:25  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 4, 2015</time> by Starhawk**
Hello MMG and welcome to the forums!

> 
> Was that title a reference to Mrs. Doubtfire? Cause that's how I took it. XD

I didn't until you said that...

In either case...MMG, welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Looking forward to seeing your designs.

Cheers,

-Claw

Well Hellooo, MMG, well hello, MMG... I thought it was a reference to "Hello Dolly."

Welcome aboard!
